description: The work calendar shall be defined as a set of start, duration, and recurrence rules that can be used to create work calendar entries of a specific type.
title: Work calendar definition entry
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: The related object(s) makes up part of this work calendar definition entry as the whole.
The work calendar definition entry property(s) defines in part this work calendar definition entry.

startRule.title: Start rule
startRule.description: Defines the starting date and time for the work calendar definition entry in ISO 8601 format for a date and time.

recurrenceTimeIntervalRule.title: Recurrence time interval rule
recurrenceTimeIntervalRule.description: Defines the rule for recurrence of the entry in ISO 8601 format for recurrences.

durationRule.title: Duration rule
durationRule.description: Defines the duration of the work calendar definition entry in ISO 8601 format for durations.

entryType.title: Entry type
entryType.description: Defines the type of work calendar definition entry. There are no standard entry types defined.
